name: download-manager
description: Node js web page downloader. Reasonable web downloader that records state and allows you to start and stop downloads. Ability to route through tor.

scripts.index: npm run build && echo ' ' && node lib/index.js
scripts.download: npm run build && echo ' ' && node lib/download.js
scripts.downloadc: npm run build && echo ' ' && node lib/download.class.js

author: Josh Rogan
